MENU_PLAN.DOUBLE_CLICK_PUBLISH: double click to publish the title
MENU_PLAN.PENCIL_CLICK_PUBLISH: click pencil to publish the title
MENU_PLAN.WARNING_CONTENT: Do you really want to do this action?
MENU_PLAN.LANG_DLG_BRIEF: Select a language from which to translate the screen and click OK or click cancel to display a blank screen.
MENU_PLAN.LANG_DEL_WARNING: The lesson plan and all courses linked to this language will be deleted.
MENU_PLAN.WARN_SAVE_CONTENT: The project must be saved before being exported. Do you want to save the project?

PAGE.BACK_SET_DEFAULT: Use this image for the entire lesson

MEDIA_CONFIG.MEDIA_CHANGE_SYNC: You have asked to change video media, the synchronization data may no longer coincide. Do you want to keep the synchronization information?
MEDIA_CONFIG.WRONG_SCREEN: Please select correct screen to add media
MEDIA_CONFIG.RENAME_MSG: A file with the same name already exists in the media management window. If you don't rename it yourself, the file you just added will be automatically renamed
MEDIA_CONFIG.ALERT_SAME_NAME: You can change the name of the media or replace the existing media
MEDIA_CONFIG.DELETE_CONFIRM: Do you want to delete the media ?
MEDIA_CONFIG.ALERT_PRODUCT_DND: You cannot drag and drop files to product media window.

EVALUATION.QUESTION: Question
EVALUATION.BY_ORDER_BRIEF: In this mode, you will make Evaluation Presentation by their original order.
EVALUATION.BY_RANDOM_BRIEF: In this mode, you will make Evaluation Presentation by random.
EVALUATION.ATTEMPTS_EXCEED: You have reached the maximum attempt at the evaluation.

PPT.TITLE: Import PowerPoint
PPT.READY_IMPORT_BRIEF: Ready to import. Do you want to start integration?

QUESTION.QUESTION_UNIQUE_BRIEF: In this question type, tester can select only one answer.
QUESTION.QUESTION_MULTIPLE_BRIEF: In this question type, tester can select several answers.
QUESTION.ATTEMPT_TITLE: Available number of attempts for the Question
QUESTION.ATTEMPT_BRIEF: The tester can only try times to answer for the question.
QUESTION.TIME_TITLE: Available time to answer for the Question
QUESTION.TIME_BRIEF: The tester only has this time to answer for the question.
QUESTION.RIGHT_ANSWER_BRIEF: Response when the student has reached the maximum attempt.
QUESTION.LAST_CHANCE_BRIEF: Response content when have only one chance more.
QUESTION.TIME_LIMIT_BRIEF: Response content when time is over.
QUESTION.OTHER_CASE_BRIEF: Response content when answer is wrong.

SYNC_MSG.WARN_PAGE_TURN_BIGGERTHAN_MIN: The time code for changing page can't be superior to
SYNC_MSG.WARN_PAGE_TURN_FORCE_MESSAGE: And the Fabrique force the value to
SYNC_MSG.WARN_PAGE_TURN_SMALLERTHAN_MAX: The time code for changing page can't be inferior to
SYNC_MSG.WARN_ELEMENT_TIMECODE_LESS: The timecode of this element must be higher than the previous timecode of the page turn
SYNC_MSG.WARN_ELEMENT_TIMECODE_HIGH: The timecode of this element must be lower than the current timecode of the page turn

EXPORT.QUESTION_CONTINUE: Do you want to ignore the export of these elements?
EXPORT.DIALOG_GUIDE: Click on YES to continue the export or on Cancel to cancel the export.
EXPORT.SCREEN_VERIFICATION_ERROR: ! Error: Some screen data is not defined or is missing
EXPORT.SCREEN_LOAD_CONVERT_ERROR: ! Error: Some screens failed to convert
EXPORT.EXPORT_ERROR: Errors occurred during the export and elements were ignored. The exported product is probably not identical to the edited project.
